title: Summoner Spell Bug on Old Account
body:
Hello there, I have not been able to find a fix for this particular problem using google. However, I think I did find the cause of it while browsing. This account had clairvoyance selected the last time I used it (I know, I was a noob, I thought it was good), but now when I try to play a game on summoner's rift in good ole 2017 I only have one spell. It doesn't allow me to choose a second spell, and repair tool did not correct this.

Any suggestions?

replies.body:
Weeeeeeeiiiiiird, this account must have been inactive for a good minute to be having this problem. No worries, we *should* be able to clear this up with a quick config reset by following the steps below. If this doesn't help, however, feel free to hit me back up and I can do a little more digging for you!

- Log into the game client
- Navigate to C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\
- Delete the folder named **Config**
- Go into a practice game and verify that settings have saved properly. 
- Leave game to sync settings
Bumping for my desire to play with two summs :(
